channel.title: Making a brochure on Microsoft Word
channel.description: I have an English project for "Of Mice and Men" due tomorrow, and I need to make a brochure for the book. The problem is, I'm using Microsoft Word but don't know how to get it to a "brochure" kind of layout. Any suggestions?

item.title: Making a brochure on Microsoft Word
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Thanks, go it done.

Lock topic now.
